chapters.title: Chapter 0 — Quick Setup & Kid-Friendly UI (10–15 min)
chapters.why: Set the world rules and helper UI so young players feel safe before the real route begins.

steps.text: Unlock the Small Settlement fast travel point plus the nearest Great Eagle Statue.

steps.text: Craft Stone Pickaxe, Stone Axe, the Old Bow, and a stack of Arrows.
steps.textKid: Make a stone pickaxe, stone axe, old bow, and arrows.

steps.textKid: Spend points on the Common Shield and Normal Parachute.

steps.text: Optional: Build a Feed Box so early pals eat automatically.
steps.textKid: Optional: Build a Feed Box so pals eat alone.

steps.text: Co-op Optional: Let player two sprint around and unlock nearby fast-travel statues.
steps.textKid: Co-op optional: Player two runs to open nearby statues.

steps.text: Catch Cattiva for the +50 carry weight passive.
steps.textKid: Catch a Cattiva. It lets you carry more.

steps.textKid: Catch a Chikipi so the Ranch makes eggs.

steps.textKid: Catch Foxparks or Rooby for easy fire help.

steps.textKid: Catch a Pengullet for watering and cooling jobs.

steps.textKid: Collect 200 wood, 200 stone, 60 fiber, 40 paldium bits, and 5 flame organs.

steps.text: Remind your kid that catching up to 10 of a pal grants bonus EXP and keep repeating the challenge whenever you enter a new biome.

steps.text: Place a Hot Spring at level 9 to keep worker pals happy and rested.
steps.textKid: Build a Hot Spring at level 9 so pals can rest and smile.

steps.text: Spend Ancient Tech Points on the Small Feed Bag and Egg Incubator once Zoe falls.
steps.textKid: Spend Ancient points on the Small Feed Bag and Egg Incubator after Zoe.
